title: TA job for Fall Semester 2024
department: 原住民族研究國際博士班
author: Ms. Dungi
content:
分類： 工讀與獎學金
來源： 原住民族研究國際博士班 - Ms. Dungi - dungi@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話+886 3 8905760
對象： 全校教職員_碩士生_博士生
標題： TA job for Fall Semester 2024
日期： Wed, 26 Jun 2024 09:28:10 +0800

Hi there!

Dr. Dana E. Powell is teaching Indigenous Peoples and Regional Studies at the International Ph.D. Program in Indigenous Studies next semester and is looking for a TA. The hourly rate for this paid job is NTD 183. 

This course requires the TA to do the following tasks:

1. Organize three guest lectures via Google Meet or WebEx. Email the speakers about the stipend paperwork.
2. Plan one field trip. Coordinate with the institution, arrange travel insurance for students, and so on.
3. Manage the class's involvement in the "Global Classroom" with Indigenous Studies collaborators in North America and Scandinavia.
4. Handle any other administrative tasks as needed.

We need someone who speaks fluent English and Chinese to communicate with local institutes and international speakers. 

All TAs must complete the TA Training Course before starting the job. 

Contact Ms. Dungi (dungi@gms.ndhu.edu.tw) for more information if you are interested.
